name: Grilled Veggie Quesadilla
description: Easy and delicious grilled veggie quesadilla. Vegan and Nut Free.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add 1 Tablespoon vegetable oil. Let the oil get hot on medium high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add 1 Tablespoon vegetable oil. Let the oil get hot on medium high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the onion sliced and let cook for 2 minutes with frequent stirring.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the onion sliced and let cook for 2 minutes with frequent stirring.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in 1 green bell pepper and 1 red pepper sliced thin and 2 serrano chili sliced finely.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in 1 green bell pepper and 1 red pepper sliced thin and 2 serrano chili sliced finely.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all and let cook on medium high heat for 7-8 minutes or till all vegetables start browning on the edges. You can also grill the veggies on a grill pan or BBQ. And of course more veggies can be added as well, like zucchini, or mushrooms. And some pinto or black beans as well!
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all and let cook on medium high heat for 7-8 minutes or till all vegetables start browning on the edges. You can also grill the veggies on a grill pan or BBQ. And of course more veggies can be added as well, like zucchini, or mushrooms. And some pinto or black beans as well!

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the simple salsa by mixing in the tomatoes, jalapeno, cilantro and lime juice, Add in a little salt and pepper. Mix everything and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the simple salsa by mixing in the tomatoes, jalapeno, cilantro and lime juice, Add in a little salt and pepper. Mix everything and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large grill pan or use a plain pan and spray oil on it.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large grill pan or use a plain pan and spray oil on it.

recipeInstructions.text: Place one tortilla on the grill pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Place one tortilla on the grill pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle some cheese on the tortilla.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle some cheese on the tortilla.

recipeInstructions.text: Layer some grilled veggies on it and spread evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Layer some grilled veggies on it and spread evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: drop small amounts of the salsa and sprinkle more cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: drop small amounts of the salsa and sprinkle more cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Top it all with another tortilla.
recipeInstructions.name: Top it all with another tortilla.

recipeInstructions.text: Press down for a minutes and then flip the quesadilla!
recipeInstructions.name: Press down for a minutes and then flip the quesadilla!

recipeInstructions.text: Press down on the other side for a minute as well..
recipeInstructions.name: Press down on the other side for a minute as well..

recipeInstructions.text: Cut it up using a pizza cutter.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut it up using a pizza cutter.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Guacamole, low fat vegan sour cream, Salsa and Habanero Sauce!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Guacamole, low fat vegan sour cream, Salsa and Habanero Sauce!

keywords: easy meal, nut free quesadilla, vegan quesadilla
